code: import axiosClient from"./axiosClient";const CartAPI={getCart:()=>{const url=`/cart`;return axiosClient.get(url);},postAddToCart:query=>{const url=`/cart/add${query}`;return axiosClient.post(url);},deleteToCart:query=>{const url=`/cart/delete${query}`;return axiosClient.delete(url);},putToCart:query=>{const url=`/cart/update${query}`;return axiosClient.put(url);}};export default CartAPI;
